response:
Oh my goodness, darling! I just can't believe how wonderful our life together is! It's truly the best thing that has ever happened to me - hands down! Our love and commitment to each other is superb, and I feel so blessed to have you by my side. You're the excellent partner, and I'm so grateful for every moment we spend together.

Now, if there's one thing that's terrible, it's when we have to deal with those awful people at work. They can be so horrible and make our day so worst! But you know what? We always find a way to make each other laugh and forget about all the awful things. And that, my love, is truly wonderful!
